entry.summary: Re 2/ A few tests have been made before the protocol switches from PoW to PoS, here is a breakdown of them: 1. Hive tests are used to test the new engine APIs 2. Kurtosis helps spin up staging networks which are testing environments to isolate specific aspects of the Merge

entry.title: Just to clarify: we were NOT targeted.
entry.summary: Just to clarify: we were NOT targeted. DeFi Pulse 🍇: 🚨 Warning! Some people are getting this notification when connecting to @etherscan or @coingecko. DO NOT SIGN any transactions that you don't recognize, and keep an eye on this “NFT Apes Win” notification, don't interact with it! https://twitter.com/JLRoyal42/status/1525222565278494720
